mapper.insert: insert into qna(qno, title, content, writer) values(qno_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content} ,#{writer})
mapper.select: select qno, title, content, wdate, writer, status, response from (select ceil(rownum / 5) as page, qno, title, content, wdate, writer, status, response from (select * from qna order by status asc, qno desc)) where page = #{pageNo}
